meta.title: Beylerbeyi - True Luxury, Bosphorus View Residences
meta.description: Bosphorus view luxury living in Beylerbeyi. Pioneer in true luxury. Seismic isolators, LEED certified, smart building technology.

hero.headline: True Luxury, Bosphorus View Beylerbeyi
hero.subheadline: In the very heart of the Bosphorus that flows gracefully between continents, where magnificence and countless stories have lived for centuries. In Beylerbeyi, you will fall in love with Istanbul again and conquer a life full of its beauties.

earthquake.title: Earthquake Safety & Seismic Isolator Technology
earthquake.subtitle: Earthquake resistant up to magnitude 10, world-class safety standards
earthquake.main_feature: Beylerbeyi Residences is built with Turkey's most advanced seismic isolator technology
earthquake.isolator_desc: Advanced technology system that separates the structure from the foundation, preventing earthquake energy from being directly transmitted to the building
earthquake.certification: TURKSTAT and international seismic safety certifications

waterfront.desc: At the heart of the Bosphorus flowing gracefully between continents

architecture.desc: Seismic isolators resistant to magnitude 10 earthquakes

location.title: Location & Access
location.description: Premium living in Beylerbeyi's historic fabric with easy access to city center.

investment.title: True Luxury Living
investment.starting_price: The blue of the Bosphorus will greet you every morning
investment.payment_plan: You will reach from one continent to another
investment.rental_yield: You will be neighbors with dolphins, friends with seagulls
investment.citizenship: You will live a district that smells of history with all its beauties

luxury_features.title: Luxury in Sustainable Design
luxury_features.interior: Walnut parquet that brings together naturalness and aesthetics in interiors where warm colors are preferred
luxury_features.technology: Lighting, shutter and underfloor heating system controlled by smart building technology
luxury_features.windows: Windows with thin profile technology that receive maximum daylight and have customizable lighting settings
luxury_features.kitchen: Light colored cabinets that create a bright and spacious atmosphere, high durability aesthetic countertops
luxury_features.bathroom: Chrome and anthracite fittings with modern and sophisticated appearance, thermostatic batteries

sustainability.title: True Luxury is Respectful to Nature
sustainability.leed: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design - LEED Certificate
sustainability.water: Water efficiency - 20% savings in building water consumption
sustainability.materials: Use of recycled environmentally friendly materials
sustainability.location: Public transportation encouraged, electric vehicle charging stations

testimonials.title: Client Reviews
testimonials.testimonial_1: The Bosphorus view exceeded our dreams. Perfect investment.
testimonials.testimonial_2: Quality and service standards are very high.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the seismic isolator system?
faq.a1: It separates the structure from the foundation, preventing energy from earthquakes being directly transmitted to the building. Designed to withstand magnitude 10 earthquakes.
faq.a2: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design, the world's most widely used green building rating system.
faq.q3: What does smart building technology include?
faq.a3: Lighting, shutters and underfloor heating system can be controlled with smart technology.
faq.a4: 3+1 (138.5m²), 4+1 (150.72m²), 5+2 Duplex (278.6m²) and 4+1 Garden Duplex (245.92m²) options available.
faq.q5: Is parking included for each unit?
faq.a5: Yes, private parking for 2 cars and private storage area is included for each unit.
